params.additionalFeeRecipients: The addresses to send the additional fees to.
params.quantity: The quantity of tokens to accept.
params.recipient: The recipient of the accepted tokens.

acceptRequestBatch(uint256[],uint256[],a.details: Additional fees are applied to each request.

params.additionalFeeRecipients: The addresses to send the additional fees to.
params.quantities: The quantities of tokens to accept.
params.recipients: The recipients of the accepted tokens.

params.cost: Amount of currency sent/received for the trade.
params.tokenContract: Address of the token being traded.

returns.royalty: Amount of currency to be paid as royalties.

params.quantity: The amount of tokens to exchange. 0 is assumed to be the request's available quantity.

params.quantities: The amount of tokens to exchange per request. 0 is assumed to be the request's available quantity.

createRequest((bool,bool,address,uint256.notice: Creates a request.A listing is when the maker is selling tokens for currency.An offer is when the maker is buying tokens with currency.

getRoyaltyInfo(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the royalty details for the given token and cost.

isRequestValid(uint256,uint256).notice: Checks if a request is valid.A request is valid if it is active, has not expired and give amount of tokens (currency for offers, tokens for listings) are transferrable.

isRequestValidBatch(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Checks if requests are valid.A request is valid if it is active, has not expired and give amount of tokens (currency for offers, tokens for listings) are transferrable.
